files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Star Wars - Rogue Squadron 3D/ROGUE/Rogue Squadron.EXE

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Star Wars - Rogue Squadron 3D/ROGUE/Rogue Squadron.EXE
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
